title: What evolving robot standards mean for implementations of cobots
description:
Changing robot standards provide an opportunity for designers of cobots to deliver improved safety and greater functionality, says IDEC.

The post What evolving robot standards mean for implementations of cobots appeared first on The Robot Report.
